summary: BULLS.TXT - THE BULLS ARE HERE, AND THEY ALWAYS HAVE BEEN! bulls.txt originates to a usenet post in 1985 and is the earliest Bull meme on the internet. These Bulls became a staple of early internet humor and were a precursor to internet memes as we know them today. Now making their way to the Ethereum blockchain, the Bulls can live on forever as the OG bulls of the internet
